thread.title: Greece Moves to Block Asylum for Turkish Officer Tied to 2016 Coup Attempt

author: Nektaria Stamouli
title: Greece Moves to Block Asylum for Turkish Officer Tied to 2016 Coup Attempt
text:
Greece’s government finds itself in a difficult diplomatic spot after political asylum was granted for one of the eight Turkish military officers who fled to Greece after the failed coup attempt in July 2016. 
Ankara responded angrily to the decision, calling it “political” and warning it could have “negative impacts” in the two countries’ already prickly relations.
